response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's worth sharing with you at an exclusive price. We are offering this remarkable product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the intrinsic value of the product and our desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We hope this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 1200000}
